div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 123038009 (Specimen)

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
123038009Specimen

publisher.value: National Resource Center for EHR Standards

description.value: This value set contains a set of SNOMED CT codes for Specimen Types
